Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.authentication.Controllers.UserManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FController

    public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements FController
    This class handles all the communication between the user system activities and the UserQueryGenerator.
    Author:
    Derek Dowling

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateUser

        public User authenticateUser(java.lang.String userName,
                    java.lang.String password)
        This method is called by the login system. It checks to see if a user name exists, and if so, the password matches it. If not, the system returns null, and if it does, returns a user of appropriate type based on role.
        Parameters:
        userName -
        password -
        Returns:
